full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GZA' DANG RGYU SKAR GYI GNOD PA BZLOG PA'I CHO GA RKYEN NGAN KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(ZHES GZA' DANG RGYU SKAR GYI GNOD PA BZLOG PA'I CHO GA RKYEN NGAN KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, 'DI NYID KYI YIG RNYING LA GZHIR BZHAG LA SLOB DPON PADMAS MDZAD PA'I GZA' BCOS DANG, GZA' YUM GYI CHO GA SOGS YI GE 'BA' ZHIG NAS KHA BSKANG STE BSGRIGS PA PO NI, ,DGE SLONG GI GZUGS TZAM 'DZIN PA'I GYI NA PA AAKshO BADZRAS GA-YAR KHRAL BYUNG BA BZHIN SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA 'DI LA, NONGS PA'I TSOGS CI MCHIS PA THAMS CAD DPYOD LDAN RNAMS KYI SPYAN SNGAR 'CHAGS SO DAG PAR MDZAD, LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD TZAM DE YOD NA DGE BA DES BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN PA'I RGYUD GYUR CIG ZHU, DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
